ANDROID COMPANION APP CONCEPT

I've been playing KSP for a couple of months now and I love this game/simulator so much. All it's missing is a useful companion app. We need a companion app that displays your cockpit screens (including realtime working diagnostics and proper NASA UI) and allows direct pilot/science controls interaction. I do not have the coding skillset to build this but I could design the UI for someone willing to help out on this. It would really take this game/simulator to another level.
